string-array.name: orientation_questions
string-array.item: How Old are you ?
What state do you live in ?
What was the day of the week, the day before yesterday ?
What is the date of the month tomorrow ?
What day of the week is Thanksgiving day celebrated in USA ?
What was the last year you observed new year eve ?
At what speed do you drive on interstate highway in mile per hour ?
Los Angeles is in which state ?
What is the capital of USA ?
Eiffel tower is in which city ?
